snippet: Gunmen from the militant group Boko Haram surrounded the village of Izge, spraying it with bullets, setting off explosions and burning down houses, witnesses said.
abstract: Suspected Islamist militants from Boko Haram kill at least 90 people in early morning attack on northern Nigerian village of Izge.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen from the militant group Boko Haram surrounded the village of Izge, spraying it with bullets, setting off explosions and burning down houses, witnesses said.

headline.main: Islamist Militants Kill Scores in Remote Northeast Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Islamist Militants Kill Scores in Remote Northeast Nigeria
